original_title: The Ice Cream Vender's a Bender
overview: Lick it before it drips. Driving from town to town the Ice Cream Man picks up the youngest boys to drink straight from the pump before bending them over his counter and showering them in cream! With the biggest cone and the juiciest sauce, the lads always come running when they hear his song or see his dirty van.
title: The Ice Cream Vender's a Bender
